title: Blue Latex

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At night, visit another player. If they attack someone, transfur them. Doesn't matter if the attack succeeded or not.

desc:
Post 2901
*"Dr. K's personal creation. We've found that it's the calmest of all the creatures. However, it seems to have a rather particular interest in both hiding in small spaces, and peaches. Not sure why. It seems to have a strong sense of justice, though. If it spots someone attacking someone else, it'll try and transfur them as punishment." -Dr.████████, MIT.*
